ygData.subject: RE: and fairy guards are found?
ygData.msgSnippet: Lesser faydark.  Good luck, I believe they re over level 30 and they re all grouped together.  If memory serves they cast nasty spells too.  While you re there
ygData.messageBody:
Lesser faydark. Good luck, I believe they're over level 30 and they're all
grouped together. If memory serves they cast nasty spells too. While
you're there you can do the gearheart quest and tell us what it rewards.
I've never heard of anybody completing that quest.

-----Original Message-----
From: Stauss, Aaron [mailto:Aaron.Stauss@...]
Sent: Friday, November 12, 1999 10:10 AM
To: 'EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com'
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] and fairy guards are found?


From: "Stauss, Aaron" <Aaron.Stauss@...>

Diamond dust is dropped by fairy guards
